meanings.definition: The action of confirming or the state of being confirmed.
meanings.sent1: The confirmations of our travel plans put my mind at ease.
meanings.sent2: I received written confirmations of my hotel reservation.
meanings.sent3: The confirmations of my friend's terrible dance moves made us all laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was a confirmation of her happiness.
meanings.sent5: The loud applause was a confirmation of the audience's enjoyment.

meanings.definition: A statement or document that confirms something.
meanings.sent1: The email confirmation of my order was in my spam folder.
meanings.sent2: Please bring your booking confirmation to the event.
meanings.sent3: The confirmation of the missing cake caused a stir at the party.
meanings.sent4: His diploma was a confirmation of his hard work in school.
meanings.sent5: The fingerprint match was a clear confirmation of the suspect's identity.
